Authors:
Nelson Menolli Jr, Bruna Suellen Breternitz, Marina
Capelari
Title:
The genus Pleurotus in Brazil: a molecular and taxonomic
overview
Keywords:
Basidiomycota Â· ITS Â· Phylogeny Â· Pleurotaceae Â·
Taxonomy
Abstract:
Considering that the knowledge of Pleurotus in Brazil is
very dispersed and fragmented, this work presents for the first time a
discussion of the recognition of at least five species certainly known
from the country. Maximum likelihood analysis was conducted with ITS
sequences to generate a phylogenetic tree with better resolution,
confirming the occurrence of P. albidus, P. djamor, P. fuscosquamulosus,
P. pulmonarius, and P. rickii in Brazil. In addition, we present a list
including all epithets recorded from Brazil and an update of their
taxonomic status.
